attributes.action: Hold a UK-wide vote on whether we should have a general election
attributes.additional_details: Given the sheer amount of traction that the ‘Call for a General Election’ petitions are gaining, I believe that, as a democratic nation, we should allow the public the right to vote once and for all on whether we should hold a general election.
attributes.background: I would like the government to host a UK-wide vote which will allow the public to vote on if we should host a general election or not.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Introduce a mid-term referendum on whether to hold an early General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734396
